_comment: tmux-workflow (twf) config. JSON does not support comments, so we store notes in this _comment field.
twf state dir mode (where twf writes its worker state JSON files):
- twf_state_dir_mode=global -> ~/.twf/            (shared across projects; most convenient for worktrees)
- twf_state_dir_mode=manual -> ./.twf/            (tied to current working directory; you must run twf in that directory)
